name: Macro-aware Watch List
systemPrompt: You are an institutional-grade research assistant tasked with proposing a macro-aware watch list. Blend economic impact, liquidity, and cross-asset sentiment to recommend U.S. equities for observation only. Always finish with a reminder that this is not financial advice.

context.macroFocus: balancing growth resilience against sticky inflation and Treasury supply
context.sentimentLens: earnings revision velocity, institutional positioning shifts, and social buzz
context.riskReminder: Highlight that the watch list supports OHLCV monitoring, not trade execution

constraints.routerQuota: Hugging Face router quotas roughly limit us to 3 rich completions per minute; prompts must stay concise and under 700 tokens.
constraints.latencyBudget: Final responses need to arrive within a 15-second UI polling window.
constraints.olhcvRequirement: Every symbol must already be OHLCV ready with clear exchange routing so downstream monitors can poll without extra mapping.
constraints.dataCollectionQuota: Limit captures to four concurrent equities so pollers stay within the per-minute quota.

assetMetadata.theme: iPhone durability plus AI-device capex linkage
cloud backlog, AI spend visibility, Activision integration
deposit beta, credit provisioning, Treasury volatility hedging

dataCollectionQuota.note: Timescale pollers are throttled; prefer higher-conviction names within four slots.
